trait.name: Chimeric Creation
entries: The fox has fur that changes color to match its surroundings, giving it advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The fox has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}1 piercing damage.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The Scarlet Sentinel is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The Scarlet Sentinel has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The Scarlet Sentinel's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.
